readable.title: 3188044631_ca3a9cc737
readable.content: A man and a woman in a apron stand near a fireplace and Christmas tree . A man and a woman posing in front of a christmas tree . A man and a woman stand in front of a Christmas tree contemplating a single thought . A man and woman with their hands on their chins are standing next to a Christmas tree . A young couple thinking about their Christmas decorations .
